title: Bloodquest: The Eye of Terror Trilogy
description: Condemned and cast out for losing a priceless ancient relic on the field of battle, Captain Leonatos and a group of his fellow battle-brothers risk everything in their quest to regain the Blade Encarmine, the lost sword of Belarius, former Chapter Master of the Blood Angels, from the dark legions of Chaos, in an omnibus edition containing the three volumes of the Bloodquest saga. Ages 12 - 16.
author: Gordon Rennie
